content:
I am currently a part of IBM Research, Bangalore, India, serving as Research Scientist in the department of AI Tech. Prior to joining IBM Research, I was a Ph.D. scholar in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE), IIT Bombay, working under the guidance of Prof. Pushpak Bhattacharyya.
Here is my CV.

title: Dr. Abhijit Mishra
